meanings.definition: A monetary unit of Albania, equal to one hundredth of a lek.
meanings.sent1: In Albania, you can buy many things with just a few qindars.
meanings.sent2: She exchanged her lek for qindars to make smaller purchases.
meanings.sent3: The qindars in his pocket jingled as he walked, making him feel rich.
meanings.sent4: Her savings, made up of qindars, grew slowly but steadily over time.
meanings.sent5: The colorful qindars sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
